short_summary: Commissioning services for Defence Construction Canada
description: Defence Construction Canada is calling for consulting services to provide "as and when required" commissioning services specific to Department of National Defence requirements.
full_summary:
**RFAP for Commissioning Services**
=====================================================

**Reference Number**: MX-42951451342
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Solicitation Number**: OR23SL02

**Notice Details**
---------------

* **Title (English)**: Defence Construction Canada - Commissioning Services
* **Title (French)**: Construction de Défense Canada - Services de mise en service
* **Announcement Date**: 2023-11-22
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-16T14:00:00 (Note: The closing date has been extended from January 9th, 2024 to January 16th, 2024.)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-16
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2027-01-09
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-01-09

**Solicitation Details**
----------------------

* **Type**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Location**: Various locations across Ontario

**Project Overview**
-----------------

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites interested consultants to submit abbreviated proposals for the establishment of a Source List (SL) to provide commissioning services to the Department of National Defence for various locations across Ontario. The SL will be for a period of three (3) years, with an estimated maximum value of $3,000,000. Commissions under the SL are expected to range from $50,000 to $350,000.

**Eligible Firms**
-----------------

Firms that consider themselves qualified to provide these services are invited to submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System.

**Document Availability**
-----------------------

Bidding and documents are available on [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; See [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

Note that the original entry has been reformatted to improve readability and includes a summary of the key information. I have avoided unnecessary details to stay within the 400-word limit. Let me know if you need further clarification or have any other questions! 

---

Also note that as a professional document redesign, it does not heavily detail-out things that need more detailed decision-making body reviews such as:

* solicitation details of expected return rate, any international trademarks, cost-free lenses/special equity aggregation demeanor Strategy infocheid Euras successes discount estim
